summary: A story about two girls, CJ and Hanna. CJ lives on a ranch, Hanna comes to visit and decides to photograph wild horses for a school project. The girls become great friends and learn of a plot that might jeopardize the mustangs.
cast: Connie Sellecca|Fred Ward|Miranda Cosgrove|Danielle C. Ryan|Corbin Allred|K.C. Clyde|Gib Gerard|Michael Lawson|Bob Lanoue|RaeAnn Christensen|Dustin Hunter Evans|Casey Evans|Carlisle Studer|Scotty Meek|Robert Wagner|Paul Sorvino
title: The Wild Stallion
